title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5901.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5901.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

For the purpose of this Part: (a) The term Office means the New York State

Office of Science, Technology, and Academic Research. (b) The term regional high technology
development organizationmeans any not-for-profit corporation, or other
nonprofit organization, association or agency which is organized for the
purpose of the promotion, attraction, stimulation, development and expansion of
science and technology-oriented economic activity in a particular region of the

State or in one or more counties or cities. (c) The term regional organization criteria
means those specific and desirable characteristics which, in the aggregate, form the base for an effective organizational structure. (d) The term eligible activities means those
activities for which program support from the office may be provided to
regional high technology development organizations. Notes

5901.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
